unnormalised: **EV Charging Getting a Boost: No More Range Anxiety on Mumbai-Pune Highway?**
normalised: E V Charging Getting a Boost: No More Range Anxiety on Mumbai-Pune Highway?

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 – Are you tired of that 'Kitna deti hai?' anxiety, but for your electric vehicle? Well, good news! Bharat Petroleum just unveiled three new EV charging stations along the busy Mumbai-Pune highway.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty six – Are you tired of that 'Kitna deti hai?' anxiety, but for your electric vehicle? Well, good news! Bharat Petroleum just unveiled three new E V charging stations along the busy Mumbai-Pune highway.

unnormalised: Finally, that weekend trip to Lonavala won’t involve praying your battery lasts longer than a typical Bollywood dance sequence.
normalised: Finally, that weekend trip to Lonavala won’t involve praying your battery lasts longer than a typical Bollywood dance sequence.

unnormalised: These new charging points, strategically placed, offer both slow and fast charging options. So, whether you’re grabbing a quick chai and vada pav or need a longer recharge, you’re covered.
normalised: These new charging points, strategically placed, offer both slow and fast charging options. So, whether you’re grabbing a quick chai and vada pav or need a longer recharge, you’re covered.

unnormalised: The charging stations are compatible with most EV models currently plying on Indian roads. Think Nexon EV, MG ZS EV, even that sleek new BMW i7 if you're feeling fancy like a Ambani!
normalised: The charging stations are compatible with most E V models currently plying on Indian roads. Think Nexon E V, M G Z S E V, even that sleek new B M W i seven if you're feeling fancy like a Ambani!

unnormalised: IIT-Bombay, in collaboration with the Maharashtra government, is also working on developing affordable and efficient charging solutions.
normalised: I I T-Bombay, in collaboration with the Maharashtra government, is also working on developing affordable and efficient charging solutions.

unnormalised: Rumour has it that Reliance is also planning a massive roll-out of charging stations across India.
normalised: Rumour has it that Reliance is also planning a massive roll-out of charging stations across India.

unnormalised: Now, if only they could bring the charging time down to the length of a 'Chaiyya Chaiyya' song, we'd *really* be talking!
normalised: Now, if only they could bring the charging time down to the length of a 'Chaiyya Chaiyya' song, we'd *really* be talking!
